name: Signature Saigon Hotel

reviews.text: Location was good but not super. Well prices room. Relatively good breakfast.
reviews.title: A good hotel (I'd rate between average and very good)

reviews.text: Unfortunately a few staff were rude and not polite as other vietnamese hotels I've stayed. They tried to charge me breakfast for 2nd pax when clearly it was shown breakfast included for 2 pax in my hotel voucher.
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.text: We had two adjoining rooms for us and the kids and it worked out great. Hotel location was convenient, rooms were clean and adequately appointed, and hot breakfast was much appreciated. Most noteworthy was the friendliness and helpfulness of the staff. They helped us with recommendations, directions, transportation, etc throughout our stay but most importantly Ryan was a lifesaver in making a number of calls for us to our next place of lodging in Hoi An when we experienced problems and working through the issues that threatened to derail our vacation. All in all a very nice stay and highly recommended.
reviews.title: Great friendly place close to all the action

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed at the Signature Saigon for 4 nights on the start of a 6 week trip in Vietnam, this is my second visit to Vietnam in 3 years. The hotel was very clean and the staff just lovely as always in Vietnam, breakfast was fine and the room I had on the 6th floor facing the street was quiet and big enough. It is within walking distance to most of area one spots including the market, river and sky tower shopping area, a word on the sky tower, dont do the tourist up to the 49th floor bit paying about $10 usd, wait till 5pm when the bar on the 52nd floor opens, go in the door way beside the Hogs breath cafe and ask at reception to go to the bar, you must wear a T shirt that covers the shoulders and covered shoes, you will then be escorted to the lifts up to the bar where you will find simply stunning views and a happy hour between 5 and 8pm where a beer from memory was about $3 usd oh and they will give you free finger food as well
reviews.title: A nice stay.
Amazing customer service
reviews.text: Do try the street food around the market, I ate there every night for basically pocket change and had great meals

Signature saigon is located nearvthe central market...room is awesome and the service is fantastic...also room was excellent with all services..the receptionist is friendly bt..next time maybe they should hav more cash to exchange...overall...was excellent..keep up the good work..
reviews.title: Good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My partner and I stayed here for 2 nights, and then an additional night on our way back from seeing Phu Quoc. We had a good experience, and it was reasonably priced. I booked it using Agoda and they gave us the suite that we had asked for and were very helpful with information, directions, and getting us to and from the airport - they even stored our luggage for us for 3 days while we went to Phu Quoc. The room was comfortable and clean although there was a strange tardas like unit in the bathroom which turned out to be a shower with the works - it was a shower, spa bath, steam room and radio all rolled into one. Hilarious and we enjoyed it but possibly not good for anyone who might struggle with climbing in and out of a large tub to have a shower. I thought the bed was a bit hard but my partner was really happy with it. We thought the breakfasts were reasonable, and there was a great deal of choice so even a picky eater would find something they liked. Most typical sights were within walking distance including the markets, Bitexco, Reunification Palace etc etc. I would recommend his hotel.
reviews.title: Good value, good service

reviews.text: This hotel has a good location and friendly staff that are willing to help with all questions. I would recommend this hotel if you wanted to be close to the markets and District 1. Breakfast was ok but nothing the rave about. Some staff don't speak English very well however there is alway a staff member around to help translate. The rooms are neat and tidy and cleaned everyday, we stayed in a family room and they only thing I thought was wrong was they charged for a rollaway in the family rooms they only have 2 beds, now usually a family needs more then 2 beds but if you want a third they make your pay USD15.00/night
reviews.title: Good Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel 2 times in a month. Both times the service and help we're beyond our expectations.We did several tours on the recommendations of the staff and we're very happy every time.Ms Hanh and her team are well versed on all the tours and know what they are talking about .They provided great help for whatever we wanted and nothing was too much trouble for them.I thought it was a great location and near to all we wanted to use .The food was good and breakfast was great ,just ask my partner Josie she didn't want to leave the breakfast table. The city is a very busy place and a must do for every one.I would not hesitate to recommend the Signature Saigon hotel to any one first class service with a smile.....
reviews.title: Not So Lost In Sai Gon

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed for 2 weeks in this Hotel, very helpful and courteous staff (hello Ryan), nothing is too much for them even for the porters, etc.
reviews.title: Excellent, don't miss this Hotel

reviews.text: Our local travel agent has arranged the rooms for us during our visit to Saigon in April/2013. The hotel is centrally located, close to main tourist attractions. We enjoyed our shopping to the Ben Than market. The rooms are very clean and spotless, staff were so nice hotel amentities are very new. Breakfast buffet style was great but no Halah. We will come back for the next trip.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, great staff !

reviews.text: My mother stayed at Signature Hotel Saigon last year and when I went to Vietnam she recommended it to me. She was completely right about the place. The location, rooms, service, food and prices were incredible. We favor it for the perfect location in the downtown area and it’s very close and convenient to everything. My room was great and had everything I need plus more. I loved the bathroom and the bed was super comfortable. The staff go out of their way to help you and are the friendliest staff I’ve met in a hotel anywhere. The breakfast was a fine spread consisting of Western and Vietnamese dishes. They make incredible omelettes and coffee. For what they offer, the price can’t be beaten in that area.
reviews.title: Can't beat it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: found this hotel to be very central and within walking distance to alot of shopping, markets, and attractions. Staff extremely helpful and pleasant. Room clean, and comfortable. All in all a great exprience, and would recommend to others and re visit ourselves.
reviews.title: top job
Made the city easy
reviews.text: Saigon can be a frantic city, but the staff at this hotel made our three days there seamless. They organised two fantastic day trips and even made us a take away breakfast for one of them that left before the restaurant opened (at no extra charge). All the restaurant recommendations they gave in the city were spot on, the room was bright and spacious, laundry was reasonably priced and efficient, breakfast was great with a wide variety, and the hotel is walking distance from the main sites. Would absolutely recommend.

This is a very good hotel. Will come back again if i am going to visit vietnam! The room is clean and the staff is very nice. Hotel food is very nice as well. :) location is good, near to behn tahn market. Its best if they can communicate well in english
reviews.title: Love this hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Signature Hotel for 4 nights. The staff members are extremely attentive and friendly and will go above and beyond to help. Buffet breakfast was provided daily, with a decent selection of food to choose from. The room itself was clean and comfortable. The hotel also organised tours and airport transfer for us at a reasonable price.
reviews.title: Friendly staff and nice location

reviews.text: The location of the hotel was central and located close to the Ben Than Market. However, the hotel is located on the other side of Ben Than Market, which means you are required to cross through the crazy Vietnam traffic to get to the other side where the market and restaurants are. This isn't a major problem, but for those travelling with family (or in my case my mother) may find the experience a bit traumatising.
reviews.title: Clean quiet and close to markets

reviews.text: Overall, my stay at the Signature hotel was pleasant and very comfortable.
reviews.title: Good location, value for money, clean.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Clean and quiet the people there are very helpful cant do enough for you. Booking excursions is at a good price and they will take care of you all the way. Transport to airport was $12 US arranged buy the Hotel.
reviews.title: Great value for money

reviews.text: Signature is in good location for walking to Ben Than markets, department stores, and all the tourist sights. The rooms were clean, the staff friendly and helpful. The buffet breakfast had something for everybody.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, best values

description: Signature Saigon Hotel is a brand new hotel suitably located in the city centre and just 100 meters from Ben Thanh Market. We are a three star hotel which offers five star services. Our hotel has 9 floors and consists of 72 elegantly furnished and designed rooms. The rooms offer spacious accommodation with great city views and every modern convenience you will require. Our central location is one of our best features. We are located within walking distance to the immediate city centre with an array of shopping centers, restaurants, bars, parks, tourist highlights and much more. Besides our great location and elegant rooms, our staff are our biggest asset. The staff at Signature Saigon Hotel are well known for their enthusiasm, problem solving skills and friendliness. We are very proud of our staff and they look forward to being of assistance to you on your stay with us.
